parameters.name: data_type
parameters.label: Input/Output data type
parameters.description: The type of individual data samples input to and output of the FFT function

parameters.name: coeff_type
parameters.label: Function coefficient type
parameters.description: The type of individual coefficients of the FFT window function

parameters.name: point_size
parameters.label: Point Size
parameters.description: The number of coefficients in the FFT window function

parameters.name: input_window_size
parameters.label: Input window size (Number of Samples)
parameters.description: The number of samples in the input window

parameters.name: shift_val
parameters.label: Scale output down by 2^
parameters.description: The power of 2 shift down applied to the product of sample and coefficient

parameters.name: ssr
parameters.label: Number of parallel input/output (SSR)
parameters.description: Specify number of data input/output in parallel
